pkgmetadata.longdescription: xmldict========Convert xml to python dictionaries, and vice-versa.Installation------------ pip install xmldictOn most of the systems, you will need the `sudo` permissions if you are doing a system wideinstall. sudo pip install xmldictExmaple---------------------:: # Converting xml to dictionary >>> xmldict.xml_to_dict(''' ... <root> ... <persons> ... <person> ... <name first="foo" last="bar" /> ... </person> ... <person> ... <name first="baz" last="bar" /> ... </person> ... </persons> ... </root> ... ''') {'root': {'persons': {'person': [{'name': {'last': 'bar', 'first': 'foo'}}, {'name': {'last': 'bar', 'first': 'baz'}}]}}}:: # Converting dictionary to xml >>> xmldict.dict_to_xml({'root': {'persons': {'person': [{'name': {'last': 'bar', 'first': 'foo'}}, {'name': {'last': 'bar', 'first': 'baz'}}]}}}) '<root><persons><person><name><last>bar</last><first>foo</first></name></person><person><name><last>bar</last><first>baz</first></name></person></persons></root>'Convert xml to python dictionaries.
